release_note: This version brings the following new features and corrections: Features: Activation of cross signature automatically when creating an account Improvements: Updated cross signature status in the security settings interface after activation Integration of improvements and fixes from Element 1.11.4 Error message in French when an invitation to a room from an external party not present in the directory fails Regular message encouraging activation of automatic backup Disabling dynamic font size if bubble display is not enabled Corrections : The list of rooms no longer freezes if you leave a room using a gesture swiped on the list of rooms Preserve text enrichments when using dynamic font size The application no longer crashes when the channel contains a deleted message was due to a side effect of the dynamic font size The application no longer crashes when you leave a room where you are the last administrator from the quick actions menu

This version brings the following new features and corrections: Features: Activation of cross signature automatically when creating an account Improvements: Updated cross signature status in the security settings interface after activation Integration of improvements and fixes from Element 1.11.4 Error message in French when an invitation to a room from an external party not present in the directory fails Regular message encouraging activation of automatic backup Disabling dynamic font size if bubble display is not enabled Corrections : The list of rooms no longer freezes if you leave a room using a gesture swiped on the list of rooms Preserve text enrichments when using dynamic font size The application no longer crashes when the channel contains a deleted message was due to a side effect of the dynamic font size The application no longer crashes when you leave a room where you are the last administrator from the quick actions menu

This version brings the following new features and corrections: What s new: viewing and participating in surveys the connection error message offers a link to the Tchap services status page Improvements: automatic activation of the email input area when creating a direct conversation in dark theme settings section titles are now visible improvement of certain interface texts Element based improvements Corrections : the Invite to join Tchap functionality works correctly again management of favorites from the general list of rooms has been corrected: the interface no longer freezes when creating direct discussions with externals these discussions are no longer hidden while waiting for the external to join the room Element based fixes
This version of Tchap brings the following new features: ability to pass additional information when sending error reports improvements to the encryption module

This version of Tchap brings the following new features: improved reliability and performance of the application moving the Log out button in user settings removal of the possibility of creating Spaces improvement of the interface in the Security and privacy settings

This version of Tchap brings the following new features: improved reliability and performance of the application improved encryption key management improvement of interface elements added access to the new FAQ in the main menu reinstatement of the bubble message display option reinstatement of Rageshake report sending

This version of Tchap brings the following new features: improved reliability and performance of the application ability to send voice messages possibility of activating automatic saving of messages restoration of sharing possibilities from a message

Version 2.3.3 of Tchap is available. Improvements: ability to reset your password without disconnecting all your other devices Corrections : a guest user can no longer create a room or invite another user

Welcome to the new version 2.2.2 of Tchap iOS! The appearance and organization of your application evolves to improve your user experience. On the agenda for changes: A new main screen Modification of the account creation connection and forgotten password paths Improved settings menu Also fixes have been made: Fixed bugs specific to iOS 16 Fixed occasional crashes Fixes to dark mode colors Fixed keyboard bug when creating a room Fixed the forums icon in the directory

Welcome to the new version of Tchap! The appearance and organization of your application evolves. In the program : A message amuses you or seems relevant to you React by selecting an emoji. Tabs are making a comeback to separate your direct messages from other channels. Message bubbles. Functional improvements.
This version corrects a problem observed in the display and access of certain attachments
Update of the security policy

Introduction of the management of my favorites allowing the conservation of messages. Added Forward option when selecting a message. Members of a room whose account has expired are grayed out and moved to the end of the list. Performance improvements and minor bug fixes.
This version allows admins to invite new members to their private rooms by sharing a link. It also makes improvements and fixes minor issues.

This version introduces a new presentation of rooms to make it easier to distinguish between private rooms private rooms open to external parties and forum rooms. It also makes improvements and fixes minor issues.
This release introduces interactive verification of your devices to make it easier to share encryption keys between them. It also makes improvements and fixes minor issues.
This release introduces interactive verification of your devices to make it easier to share encryption keys between them. It also makes improvements and fixes minor issues.
This release introduces interactive verification of your devices to make it easier to share encryption keys between them. It also makes improvements and fixes minor issues.
This version brings improvements and fixes minor issues. It also supports document sharing via Tchap.
This release updates the configuration settings used during secure connections. It also contains some minor improvements and bug fixes.

This version optimizes exchanges between members of the Tchap community and external users invited to Tchap. In particular it allows the administrator of a room to authorize or prohibit entry into the room to external users. Furthermore this version allows the sending of invitations by email. Finally it contains some minor improvements and fixes.
This version allows the selection and sending of files other than photos in a room. It also contains other improvements and fixes minor issues.
This version fixes an issue observed with VoiceOver so that you can accept the terms of use when creating an account. It also fixes other minor issues.

This version supports automatic password management by the system. The last message received is now displayed when entering a room. The problem of unjustified disappearance of notification badges is also corrected.
